header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON THIRD READING

text.quote: 000: Clause 7, page 12, line 29, leave out “for the date for the time being” and insert “, which shall not be later than 29 April 2018, for the date”
000: Clause 9, page 13, line 36, at end insert—

“(2C) In complying with any duty under subsection (2B), if it appears that there is a conflict between any of the duties under this section, the Secretary of State shall attach greater weight to his duties under subsection (2B).”
000: Schedule 1, page 39, line 18, leave out from beginning to “and”
